contest-event.event-date:
May 15, 1993 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
John O'Gaunt [Vinter]
Casino Bern, Switzerland Best Soloist: Mylène Gay, BB Treize Etoiles
Sept. 2, 2012, 10:51 p.m. Sept. 27, 2015, 3:03 p.m.
1 Brass Band Berner Oberland James Gourlay Circius
2 Brass Band Treize Etoiles Géo-Pierre Moren
3 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Ludwig Wicki
4 Oberaargauer Brass Band Manfred Obrecht
5 Brass Band Limburg Maurice Hamers
6 Brass Band Mühledorf Walter S. Fankhauser
7 Brass Band Imperial Lenzburg Pascal Eicher
8 Brass Band Konkordia Büsserach Albert Brunner
